step.cmd: If the number of responding DB VMs is not equal to the number of all the DB VMs in one rack, repeat the previous step again. If none of the DB VMs are responding, the entire DB may be DOWN. If the state is persistent, check the DB status using the “db-stats tool” described in the Tools chapter of the Administration Guide for information to assist with troubleshooting.
